meanings.definition: To ask (someone) to go somewhere or do something
meanings.sent1: She invited her friend to the party.
meanings.sent2: They invited their neighbors for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat invited the dog to play chase.
meanings.sent4: The warm breeze invited the flowers to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The colorful poster invited everyone to the event.

meanings.definition: To offer (someone) the opportunity to do something
meanings.sent1: He invited her to join the team.
meanings.sent2: The school invited students to participate in the science fair.
meanings.sent3: The open field invited children to run and play.
meanings.sent4: The blank canvas invited the artist to create.
meanings.sent5: The clear sky invited stargazers to observe the constellations.
